title: Mike Oldfield - Boxed (3CD)(1989)[FLAC]
description:
Short:

This 3 CD Set Features The 4 Albums Originally Included In The Mike Oldfield
'Boxset' Set. Remixed Versions Of 'Tubular Bells', 'Hergest Ridge', And 'Ommadawn'.
All Tracks From 'Collaborations' Are Included As Follows:
Disc 1: 3/4/5, Disc 2: 3/4/5, Disc 3: 3/4. Enjoy..

***

Tubular Bells: (Recorded at The Manor at various times between Autumn 1972 and Spring 1973)

1."Tubular Bells" Part One (Mike Oldfield)
2."Tubular Bells" Part Two (Oldfield except Sailor's Hornpipe (Traditional)

Collaborations:

3."The Rio Grande" (Traditional)(1975)
4."Portsmouth" (Featuring Leslie Penning) (Traditional)(1976)
5."In Dulci Jubilo" (Featuring Leslie Penning and William Murray) (Traditional)(1975)

Hergest Ridge: (Recorded at The Manor in Spring 1974)

1."Hergest Ridge" Part One (Oldfield)
2."Hergest Ridge" Part Two (Oldfield)

Collaborations:

3."Extract from Star's End" (Featuring David Bedford, Chris Cutler and The Royal Philharmonic Orchestra)(1974)
4."Argiers" (Traditional)(1976)
5."Speak Tho' You Only Say Farewell" (Featuring Bedford) (Ray Morello, Horatio Nicholls)(1974)

Ommadawn: (Recorded at The Beacon, Herefordshire, January to September 1975)

1."Ommadawn" Part One (Oldfield)
2."Ommadawn" Part Two (Oldfield)

Collaborations:

3."The Phaeacian Games" (David Bedford)(1976)
4."First Excursion" (Oldfield, Bedford)(1976)

***
